alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bertie, Northampton, Hertford, Gates and northwestern Chowan Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rich Square to near Rockyhock. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rich Square around 140 PM EDT. Woodland, Harrellsville and Hobbsville around 145 PM EDT. Gatesville around 200 PM EDT. Sunbury and Conway around 205 PM EDT. Roduco around 210 PM EDT. Gates and Seaboard around 215 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Goose Pond, Eagletown, Milwaukee, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Newsome Store and Savage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
